sources.title: Speed Devils (1935)
sources.description: A race car driver, injured during an accident, opens up a repair shop only to become the target of crooked government agents. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/speed-devils-1935/

metadata.Plot: Martin Gray (Paul Kelly)and Dan Holden (Russell Hardie) are rival race-car drivers, and both crash in a big race and decide to give up racing and become partners in an auto-repair business. Pat Corey (Marguerite Churchill'), a reporter on the local newspaper,has been Dan's girlfriend but she falls in love with Martin. The latter refuses to accept any city-repair work which involves kickback payments to a couple of crooked politicians, but DAn is apparently willing to do so. The politicians plot to split the partners by showing Dan that Martin is romancing Pat.
metadata.Actors: Paul Kelly, Marguerite Churchill, Russell Hardie
